title: Exotic Chew Toy
summaries: The Exotic Chew Toy is a pet-summoning item that spawns a Fennec Fox pet to follow the player around. When the player is far enough away or in midair, the Fennec Fox pet will fly by flapping its ears like wings to catch up to them. The Exotic Chew Toy can be purchased from the Traveling Merchant for 1 PC.

statistics.Tooltip:
Summons a fennec fox
'It squeaks at a glorious 96kHz!'
statistics.Buy: 1 PC
statistics.Sell: 20 GC
